ROOT.SkipRegion: AND (REGION LIKE '天津%' OR REGION LIKE '北京%' OR REGION LIKE '河北%' OR REGION LIKE '山西%' OR REGION LIKE '冀北%' OR REGION LIKE '山东%' OR REGION LIKE '蒙西%' OR REGION LIKE '内蒙古%')
ROOT.ChangeRegion: CASE WHEN REGION LIKE '内蒙古%' THEN '蒙西' ELSE SUBSTR(REGION,0,2) END AS REGION
ROOT.GetLightCountP: select region,region,count(1) c FROM ( SELECT same:ChangeRegion from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} same:SkipRegion UNION ALL SELECT same:ChangeRegion from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 where date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} and date_time>=sysdate same:SkipRegion ) a group by region order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightCountC: select city_owner,city,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_lightning_district where province_owner={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} group by city_owner,city order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightCountD: select district_owner,district,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_lightning_district where city_owner={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} group by district_owner,district order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightPTime: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where region={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} UNION ALL SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,NULL FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 where region={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} and date_time>=sysdate order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightPTimeBK: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_lightning_district where province_owner={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightCTime: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where region={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightCTimeBK: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_lightning_district where city_owner={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightDTime: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where region={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightDTimeBK: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_lightning_district where district_owner={2} and date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} order by date_time
ROOT.GetLightAllTime: SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,peak_current,region FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} UNION ALL SELECT date_time,longitude,latitude,NULL ,region FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 where date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} AND date_time>=sysdate order by date_time
ROOT.GetEffectLineBK: SELECT affect_obj_id,affect_type,is_forecast,lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning where affect_type=2 /*AND lightning_time>2*/ AND start_time<{1} AND end_time>{0}
ROOT.GetLineTower: select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,date_time,longitude,latitude,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} and date_time<{2} UNION ALL select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,date_time,longitude,latitude ,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 where line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} and date_time<{2} AND date_time>=sysdate
ROOT.GetLineTowerBK: select tower_id_start,tower_id_end,date_time,lightning_longitude,lightning_latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower where line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} and date_time<{2}
ROOT.GetLineStat: SELECT line_id,0,0,count(1) as lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 where date_time<{1} AND date_time>={0} and line_id is not null group by line_id UNION ALL SELECT line_id,0,0,count(1) as lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 where date_time<{1} AND date_time>={0} AND date_time>=sysdate and line_id is not null group by line_id
ROOT.GetLineStatBK: SELECT affect_obj_id,0,0,count(1) as lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning where affect_type=2 AND lightning_time>2 AND start_time<{1} AND end_time>{0} group by affect_obj_id
ROOT.GetLineWarn: select date_time,date_time as se,alarm_level,'' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 WHERE line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} AND date_time<{2} UNION ALL select date_time,date_time,alarm_level,'' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 WHERE line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} AND date_time<{2} AND date_time>=sysdate ORDER BY date_time DESC
ROOT.GetLineWarnBK: select l.start_time,l.end_time,l.lightning_time,f.fault_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_h_fault f on f.REASON_CLASS=2002 AND l.affect_obj_id=f.equip_id --and l.start_time<=f.fault_time and l.end_time>=f.fault_time and l.start_time<= f.fault_time+3 units minute and l.start_time>=f.fault_time-3 units minute WHERE l.affect_obj_id={0} AND l.lightning_time>2 AND l.start_time>={1} AND l.start_time<{2} ORDER BY l.start_time DESC
ROOT.GetLineTowerPosition: select t.longitude,t.latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on l.tower_id_start=t.id where line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} and date_time<{2} UNION select t.longitude,t.latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on l.tower_id_end=t.id where line_id={0} AND date_time>={1} and date_time<{2}
ROOT.GetLightCount: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_h_lightninglive_{{0}} WHERE date_time>={1} and date_time<{2}
ROOT.GetTimesByLineTime: select start_time,end_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning where affect_type=2 and affect_obj_id={0} and start_time<={1} and end_time>={1}
ROOT.GetFaults: select distinct l.affect_obj_id,'','',f.fault_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_h_fault f on l.affect_obj_id=f.equip_id --and l.start_time<=f.fault_time and l.end_time>=f.fault_time and l.start_time<= f.fault_time+3 units minute and l.start_time>=f.fault_time-3 units minute where f.REASON_CLASS=2002 AND l.affect_type=2 and f.fault_time<='{1}' and f.fault_time>='{0}'
